name: Pre-construction Concrete Substrate Readiness Checklist
Details
Viking Peel and stick & Underslab Concrete substrate Readiness checklist received from Main contractor
Cavities and cracks filled with repair mortar, flushed off and cured
All protrusions removed. Surface free from foreign matter
Mortar or bitumen Fillets to all upstands and smooth 5mm radius to all external edges ***
Underfootings Checklist
Details
Underslab membrane extends beyond footing and protected until vertical membrane installed
Any mechanical damage to membrane repaired to specification
Side laps 80mm and end laps 150mm fully torched and seamed. Bleed visible on all joints. ***
Membrane fully adhered to substrate wth no bridging, bubbling or delaminating
Overall installation free of wrinkles bubbles,creases or splits
Viking protection boards installed correctly
Vertical Checklist
Details
Peel and stick membrane underflashed 300mm wide over mortar fillet***
Any movement joints installed to approved specification/detail
Any mechanical damage to membrane repaired to specification
Side laps 80mm and end laps 150mm fully torched and seamed. Bleed visible on all joints
Overall installation free of wrinkles bubbles, creases and splits
Membrane protection boards installed correctly ***
